title: BRIEF-Manila Water Co Updates On Decision From Supreme Court Over Clean Water Act
text:
BRIEF-Manila Water Co Updates On Decision From Supreme Court Over Clean Water Act

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 18, 2019 10:00)

BRIEF-Manila Water Co Updates On Decision From Supreme Court Over Clean Water Act Sept 18 (Reuters) - Manila Water Company Inc :

* UPDATES ON DECISION FROM SUPREME COURT OVER CLEAN WATER

ACT

* IN SAID DECISION, SUPREME COURT FOUND COMPANY LIABLE FOR

FINES

FOR VIOLATION THE PHILIPPINE CLEAN WATER ACT



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX24xQw4

Further company coverage: MWC.PS





BRIEF-Manila Water Co Updates On Decision From Supreme Court Over Clean Water Act
